PropertyList.text:
________________________Procedures_________________________ Takeoff : flaps 1/4 2900 RPM, rotation at 130 kt (full load), 120 kt (landing load); retract gear below 165 k, retract flaps below 184 kt. Climb : always above 180 kt (drag). below 48.0 inhg and 2600 RPM (engine temperature). reduce pitch to the lowest RPM (if not enough, reduce throttle), then reduce mixture to the highest RPM (and torque). decrease mixture (highest EGT) with altitude, otherwise engine stops. Cruise : 220 kt at 20000 ft, 197 kt at 25000 ft. Descent : max pitch (i.e. lowest thrust of propeller curve). Approach : 10 NM at 1500 ft. flaps 1/4 below 184 kt; gear below 165 kt, flaps 1/2 below 161 kt, flaps 3/4 below 154 kt, full flaps below 148 kt. Landing : maintain 125 kt (landing load); touch down 110 kt (landing load), 100 kt (empty load).
________________________Limitations________________________ Vne (never exceed) : 293 kt until 11000 ft; then - 11 kt / 2000 ft Vno (normal operation): 260 kt until 11000 ft, then - 9 kt / 2000 ft Vne at 20000 ft : 244 kt Vno at 20000 ft : 220 kt Vne at 25000 ft : 216 kt Vno at 25000 ft : 197 kt Vf (takeoff flaps 60%) : 184 kt Va (maneuvring) : 180 kt Vlo (landing gear operation) : 165 kt Vle (landing gear extension) : 165 kt Vf (approach flaps 66%) : 161 kt Vf (80%) : 153 kt Vf (landing flaps 100%) : 148 kt
ceiling : 25000 ft cruise : 20000 ft range : 3600 NM
take-off (2.75 minutes) at sea level : 54.5 inhg 2900 rpm take-off (2.75 minutes) at 4500 ft : 52.5 inhg 2900 rpm maximum at sea level : 48.0 inhg 2600 rpm maximum at 5300 ft : 46.0 inhg 2600 rpm maximum at 10800 ft : 47.5 inhg 2600 rpm maximum at 16000 ft : 46.0 inhg 2600 rpm
max take-off : 120000 lb max landing : 98500 lb
